definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]

pinyin: zi4 sha1 zha4 dan4 sha1 shou3

sentences.english: My mother died early… Hu Defu quit. < /p> < p> shangjingwu walking in the street, everyone feels like is juntong killer.
sentences.chinese: 汤敬武走在街上，感觉每个人都像是军统的杀手。

sentences.english: Bounty hunters trying to stop her from reaching Five Elements Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 玉疆杀手想阻止我去五指山。

sentences.english: However, its role is more that of a super-heavy tank destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 怎么说呢，他时常扮演一个超重型的坦克杀手角色。

sentences.english: Stone I dare see woman killer body shape is so flexible, in the heart had a surprised.
sentences.chinese: 石敢当见女杀手身形如此灵活，心中吃了一惊。

sentences.english: Black ant cant stand stimulation in a pet like the giant killer.
sentences.chinese: 黑蚁受不了激，一气之下就想对擎天下杀手。

sentences.english: In low-resource settings, infectious diseases continue to be the major killer.
sentences.chinese: 在资源匮乏地区，传染病仍然是主要杀手。

sentences.english: After a fight, Max, but maggie off the killer was hijacked in go.
sentences.chinese: 经过一场搏斗，马克斯干掉了杀手，但玛吉却被劫走。

sentences.english: Yeah, the killer was completely unfeeling. He even killed old ladies!
sentences.chinese: 看了，那个杀手真是惨无人道，连老太太都杀。

sentences.english: Dexter is a serial killer who lends his talent to the Miami Metro Police Department.
sentences.chinese: 德柯斯特是一个连环杀手，在迈阿密警察局任职。

sentences.english: Working together with one or more people to put together a killer presentation?
sentences.chinese: 想要和几个哥们一起捣鼓出一个杀手级的演示文稿？

sentences.english: Mathilda: You mean you're a hitman?
Why was Chigurh being arrested at the beginning of the film?
sentences.chinese: 杀手在电影开始的时候为什么被捕？

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the leading killers in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，心脏病是一个主要的杀手之一。

sentences.english: Three of us are killers, waiting bidden in line.
sentences.chinese: 三个是杀手，正排着队等候。

sentences.english: By investigations, I worked out some principles to be a qualified LADY-KILLER.
sentences.chinese: 调查，找出原则是合格的杀手。

definition: mythological figure (such as the Grim Reaper) in charge of taking the souls of those who die/(fig.) death
to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
